title: Effects of three tebuconazole nanopesticides on the survival of Daphnia magna
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,1044-1059
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00673E, Paper
Mahleh Eghbalinejad, Rocío López-Cabeza, Jan Kotouček, Renato Grillo, Marek Koutný, Zuzana Bílková, Jakub Hofman
The growing pressure to reduce excessive pesticide use has led to exploring novel formulation methods, including nanoparticle carriers for active substances.
